title: I'm a little teapot
brief_description: 35 delightful and well known activity songs and rhymes presented by Elizabeth Watts which will entertain and delight young children. Apart from the title song, “I’m a little teapot”, classic songs such as “Humpty Dumpty”, “Baa baa black sheep” and “The Hokey cokey” are featured.
